newsitem.title: TUNISIA: Tunis bourse index closes up in lower trade.
newsitem.headline: Tunis bourse index closes up in lower trade.

text.p: The Tunis Stock Exchange index on Wednesday closed up by 0.49 percent in lower trade, bourse sources said.
The 31-share index closed at 485.98 from 483.6 on Tuesday.
Volume was 1.92 million dinars against 3.94 million dinars. Turnover on the first market was 1.85 million dinars against 846,166 dinars on Tuesday.

Leasing firm Tunisie Leasing won 0.92 dinar to 31.66 dinars. Placement de Tunisie gained 0.85 dinar to 14.85. Palm Beach Hotels was up 0.48 dinar to 11.48 dinars. Airliner Tunis Air rose 0.4 dinar to 19.9.
BDET bank was down 0.5 dinar to 16.1 dinars.
Trade was active on Banque Nationale Agricole with 27,500 shares changing hands at the unchanged price of 31 dinars. ($= 1.07 dinars)
